TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DelimitedListTraceListener extends System.Diagnostics.TextWriterTraceListener

summary.span: 将跟踪或调试输出定向到文本编写器（如流编写器）或流（如文件流）。

span.span: Directs tracing or debugging output to a text writer, such as a stream writer, or to a stream, such as a file stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 跟踪输出采用带分隔符的文本格式，该格式使用由 属性指定的分隔符。The trace output is in a delimited text format that uses the delimiter specified by the property. 分隔符用于在输出行中终止每个字段。The delimiter is used to terminate each field in a line of output. 例如，若要在 Microsoft Excel 电子表格中显示跟踪输出，可以指定一个逗号（"，"）作为分隔符，并创建逗号分隔值（CSV）文件。For example, to display the trace output in a Microsoft Excel spreadsheet, you might specify a comma (",") as a delimiter and create a comma-separated value (CSV) file. > [!IMPORTANT] > 接口。 interface. 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型，请在`try`/`catch` 块中调用其 方法。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a`try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息，请参阅 接口主题中的“使用实现 IDisposable 的对象”一节。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. 你可以通过应用程序配置文件启用或禁用 ，然后在你的应用程序中使用配置的 。You can enable or disable a through the application configuration file and then use the configured in your application. 或者，您可以在代码中创建 。Alternately, you can create a in your code. > [!NOTE] > 仅使用名称以单词 `Trace`开头的方法来仅分隔发出的文本，如 或 。The delimits only text that is emitted by using the methods that have names starting with the word `Trace`, such as or . 使用 和 方法发出的跟踪数据未进行分隔。Trace data that is emitted by using the and methods is not delimited. 若要配置 ，请编辑与应用程序名称对应的配置文件。To configure a , edit the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application. 在此文件中，可以添加侦听器，设置侦听器的属性，或删除侦听器。In this file, you can add a listener, set the properties for a listener, or remove a listener. 应设置配置文件的格式，如以下示例中所示：The configuration file should be formatted as shown in the following example: ```xml ``` > [!NOTE] > 如果尝试写入正在使用或不可用的文件，则该文件名将自动以 GUID 为前缀。If you try to write to a file that is in use or unavailable, the file name is automatically prefixed by a GUID. > [!NOTE] > 侦听器旨在由 、和 类的方法用来编写跟踪信息。Listeners are intended to be used by methods of the , , and classes to write trace information. 除构造函数之外的侦听器方法不应在应用程序代码中直接调用。Listener methods, except for constructors, should not be called directly from application code.

summary.span: 初始化写入指定输出流并具有指定名称的 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that writes to the specified output stream and has the specified name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `null``name` 参数，则此构造函数将 属性初始化为 `name` 参数的值，或初始化为空字符串（""）。This constructor initializes the property to the value of the `name` parameter, or to an empty string ("") if the `name` parameter is `null`. 属性可用作 `Listeners` 集合的索引，以编程方式更改侦听器的属性。The property can be used as an index into the `Listeners` collection to programmatically change the properties for the listener. 例如，下面的代码将设置名称为 "delimListener" 的 实例的 属性：For example, the following code sets the property for the instance of that has the name "delimListener": ```csharp ((DelimitedListTraceListener)Trace.Listeners["delimListener"]).Delimiter = ":" ```

summary.span: 初始化写入指定文件并具有指定名称的 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that writes to the specified file and has the specified name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数使用 编码为指定路径上的指定文件初始化 类的新实例。This constructor initializes a new instance of the class for the specified file on the specified path, using encoding. 如果文件存在，则将其追加到。If the file exists, it is appended to. 如果该文件不存在，则创建一个新文件。If the file does not exist, a new file is created. > [!NOTE] > 若要减少异常的几率，任何可能使输出无效的字符都将替换为 "？" 字符。To reduce the chance of an exception, any character that might invalidate the output is replaced with a "?" character. 如果 `null``name` 参数，则 属性设置为 `name` 参数的值，或设置为空字符串（""）。The property is set to the value of the `name` parameter, or to an empty string ("") if the `name` parameter is `null`. 属性可用作 `Listeners` 集合的索引，以编程方式更改侦听器的属性。The property can be used as an index into the `Listeners` collection to programmatically change the properties for the listener. 例如，下面的代码将设置名称为 "delimListener" 的 实例的 属性：For example, the following code sets the property for the instance of that has the name "delimListener": ```csharp ((DelimitedListTraceListener)Trace.Listeners["delimListener"]).Delimiter = ":" ```

summary.span: 获取或设置分隔列表的分隔符。

span.span: Gets or sets the delimiter for the delimited list.
The delimiter for the delimited list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认分隔符为 ";"（分号）。The default delimiter is ";" (semicolon). 下面的配置文件示例演示如何使用配置文件中的 `delimiter` 属性设置 属性：The following configuration file example shows the setting of the property using the `delimiter` attribute in a configuration file: ```xml ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自定义特性是不是从基类继承的属性，可用于设置类的属性。A custom attribute is an attribute that is not inherited from the base class that can be used to set a property for the class. 的自定义属性用于设置 属性。The custom attribute for is used to set the property. 下面的配置文件示例演示如何使用 `delimiter` 特性来设置 属性：The following configuration file example shows the use of the `delimiter` attribute to set the property: ```xml ```

param.name: eventCache
param.span: 一个 对象，其中包含当前进程 ID、线程 ID 和堆栈跟踪信息。

span.span: A object that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.

param.name: source
param.span: 标识输出时使用的名称，通常为生成跟踪事件的应用程序的名称。

span.span: A name used to identify the output, typically the name of the application that generated the trace event.

param.name: eventType
param.span: 指定引发跟踪的事件类型的 值之一。

span.span: One of the values specifying the type of event that has caused the trace.

param.name: id
param.span: 事件的数值标识符。

span.span: A numeric identifier for the event.

param.name: data
param.span: 要向输出文件或流中写入的数据对象。

span.span: A data object to write to the output file or stream.

summary.span: 向输出文件或流中写入跟踪信息、数据对象和事件信息。

span.span: Writes trace information, a data object, and event information to the output file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `source`、`eventType`和 `id` 参数的值以标头形式写入。The values of the `source`, `eventType`, and `id` parameters are written as a header. 使用对象的 `ToString` 方法将数据对象转换为字符串。The data object is converted to a string using the `ToString` method of the object. `eventCache` 的数据将作为脚注写入，其内容取决于 属性的值。The `eventCache` data is written as a footer whose content depends on the value of the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 不应由应用程序代码调用 方法。The method is not intended to be called by application code. 它由 、和 类的方法调用，用于写入跟踪数据。It is called by methods of the , , and classes to write trace data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `source`、`eventType`和 `id` 参数的值以标头形式写入，后跟 `message` 数据。The values of the `source`, `eventType`, and `id` parameters are written as a header, followed by the `message` data. `eventCache` 的数据将作为脚注写入，其内容取决于 属性的值。The `eventCache` data is written as a footer whose content depends on the value of the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 不应由应用程序代码调用 方法。The method is not intended to be called by application code. 它由 、和 类的方法调用，用于写入跟踪数据。It is called by methods of the , , and classes to write trace data.

summary.span: 将跟踪信息、格式化对象数组和事件信息写入输出文件或流中。

span.span: Writes trace information, a formatted array of objects, and event information to the output file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `source`、`eventType`和 `id` 参数的值以标头形式写入。The values of the `source`, `eventType`, and `id` parameters are written as a header. 使用 方法将 `args` 对象数组转换为字符串，同时传递 `format` 字符串和 `args` 数组，以将字符串格式化为跟踪的消息部分。The `args` object array is converted to a string using the method, passing the `format` string and `args` array to format the string as the message portion of the trace. `eventCache` 的数据将作为脚注写入，其内容取决于 属性的值。The `eventCache` data is written as a footer whose content depends on the value of the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 不应由应用程序代码调用 方法。The method is not intended to be called by application code. 它由 、和 类的方法调用，用于写入跟踪数据。It is called by methods of the , , and classes to write trace data.
